inn1.comm: full and wide, Sehwag swings the bat and it and gets that over the vacant gully region and down to McGrath at third man, the ball kept low, not a good sign
good ball, fast and swing, more bounce too as Sehwag goes for an expansive drive and gets beaten
good, straight ball on the off stump, defended by Sehwag
fuller ball on middle and leg, moving down, and Sehwag cant time his flick well enough, ball rolls to square leg

on a good length, Sehwag drives and manages to squeeze that in the gap between point and gully, and thats a tremendous diving stop by McGrath covering about 20 metres on the ropes, awesome stuff from him
full and swinging away outside the off stump, and Tendulkar leaves it alone
bang on the money, lands outside off stump and moves in, Sehwag hops and defends to the on side
wider this time and Sehwag opens the face and places that in the gap at gully for one to third man
lands on off stump and moves in, thats the slower ball, played with soft hands to midwicket
wider and fuller outside off stump, and Tendulkar says no thanks mate, and watches it pass to Gilchrist
lands outside off stump and comes in, Tendulkar caught high on the back leg defending
wider on a good length outside off stump, and Tendulkar leaves it alone
short and wide, thats where he likes them, doesnt move the feet and bludgeons that past point and gully for four, typical Sehwag shot
better ball on a good length, comes into him and he plays that with soft hands, Lee oversteps as well
short and rising, Sehwag tries one of those cheeky uppercuts over the slips, not a good option, sir
dropped! Fuller and wide, Sehwag flays the bat at it and Clarke at deep gully gets his hands to it but cant hold on, that ball flew to him at a blistering pace, but its a chance gone down
good ball outside off stump and rising into him, he sways away and lets it pass, well left
good length ball, Tendulkar gets right on top of it and defends impeccably, good to see
wide of off stump and again Tendulkar leaves it alone
full and wide outside off stump, some lateral movement, left alone
good ball, comes back in from off stump and he defends with pad and bat married in defense, well played
shorter and he tries to drive, gets beaten, no footwork at all
lands on a good length, Sehwag drives past cover off the backfoot for one
lands on a good length and moves in, Tendulkar shoulders arms
good ball swinging away outside off stump, left alone again
good length ball outside off stump, Sehwag drives and gets an inside edge past the stumps, the real french cut, as they call it, for four
full and wide, a no ball to boot, and Sehwag hammers that on the up past cover for four, aggressive shot
good ball on the stumps, well defended by Sehwag, perhaps anticipating that after the four-ball one will come into him
good ball again, moves in from outside off stump and its defended to midwicket
this ones full and coming in, beats him on the drive, well bowled, great one
fuller on the pads, a noball again, and he mistimes the flick
too wide and he swings the bat at that one, misses by a country mile
full and wide, Tendulkar unleashes that square drive, on bended knee, open face ofthe bat and its beats Symonds' dive at point and the ball speeds away
well bowled, comes into him from outside off stump but his bat and pad are together as he defends, classic Tendulkar defence, well played, fantastic cricket all round
wide of off stump and moving away, Sehwag leaves it alone watchfully
lands on a good length and comes in, but Sehwag is right behind it in defence
another good ball comes in but Sehwag is right behind it, up on the toes
well played again, gets right behind it and defends, good to see
short of a good length, goes back and drives to Clarke at backward point
a tad fuller but he cant time the drive, ball goes to Symonds at cover on the bounce
from around the wicket, ball lands outside leg stump and raps the pad, they get a leg bye
full in the slot, Sehwag unleashes a firm straight drive between the nonstriker and the stumps for four, ball screamed down the turf
a tad slower, lands around leg stump and Sehwag cant time his defense that well, ball pops up in the air and lands safely
fuller this time, driven to Lee at mid-off for a sharp single, the throw comes in and hits the stumps but he's safe
a bouncer, catches him by surprise, he thought of the hook but the ball comes onto him, raps the helmet, well bowled
good ball on off stump, he defends and the ball shoots to point, they pinch a run
full and wide, he plays across the line with an ugly swide to mid-on, rash shot and McGrath has a word for Tendulkar, who smiles
on a good length, Tendulkar walks down the track and drives to mid-off, good intent
on a good length again, Tendulkar drives and gets the edge along the ground in the gap at gully, one run there
good ball, full and Sehwag gets over that with some impeccable defence there
fuller this time, he slashes that in the gap at gully again
great ball, shapes outside off stump and beats Tendulkar's forward defence
good length ball angling away from him, he defends off the front foot to cover, call of 'NO' back to Tendulkar
good length ball again, Sehwag stands and defends, gets an inside edge near to the stumps
great ball, bit of bounce there, beats him outside the off stump
another good delivery, angles across him and he's cramped up trying to defend, gets beaten
gives him the charge, ball is on a good length, frees the arms and lofts that over the offside, ball bounces into the ropes
good comeback delivery, better length on the stumps, defended to cover
good, fullish ball outside the off stump, Tendulkar judges it and watches it through
this one lands outside off stump and moves away, Tendulkar shoulders arms
comes into him from a good length, Tendulkar goes back and defends and gets the edge, luckily he kept it down, ball runs past second slip for four
fuller outside off stump, he again plays a strange drive with a lot of bottom hand and the ball scoots to mid-on

he's gone! A typical McGrath special, lands on a sweet length outside off stump, on the seam, a little bit of movement to boot, and Tendulkar's caught defending on the hop, the ball kisses the edge and lands in Gilchrist's safe hands, Australia strike,McGrath wins this battle, crowd hushed
angles across him off stump and moves away, and he leaves it alone
good ball, catches him on the hop, hits him high on the thigh and the ball scoots to the offside
good ball on middle and off, Sehwag stands and defends back to him, absolutely no room being offered
lands on one leg stump, Sehwag flicks that down to Mitchell Johnson at fine leg, who fields but steps on the ropes, sloppy work and its a four for India
better ball, middle and leg, Sehwag hops and defends to the on side, loud call of 'NO'
similar ball, tucks him up, he defends to the on side
good away movement this time from off stump, Sehwag is rooted to his crease and decides to chase it, gets beaten, well bowled
banged in short, the local boy stands and pulls that with authority from outside off stump, what a shot, the home crowd loves it
fuller on the stumps, well defended with compact technique
straight ball on the stumps, again defended, and Sehwag wants a run! Fat chance, comes the reply from Mongia
good moving ball around outside off stump and shaping away, Mongia knows where his off stump is and leaves it alone, well left
identical delivery, McGrath getting the ball to land on a good spot, but again Mongia leaves it alone with good judgement
good ball, angled even more across him, invites the forward defence and gets Mongia beaten by the movement
good length ball on off stump, Sehwag stands and defends with soft hands, looking to consciously keep the ball down
fuller on the legs, tries to turn that fine but gets a leg bye in front of cover, Mongia called for it from the start
lands on a good length outside off stump, Mongia defends in front of point but they resist the single as Clarke's the man hovering there&
angled full outside off stump, left alone for Gilchrist to collect
fuller and moving in, and edgy Mongia misreads the length and drives loosely with one hand to point
fuller outside off and slower, beats Mongia's loose drive, ball stays low as well
good length ball on the stumps, Sehwag stands and drives that to cover
identical ball, but this time its beautifully angled past gully to Lee at third man
angles into leg stump, Mongia tries to defend buts get beaten, ball was moving down leg clearly
good ball on the stumps, Mongia stands erect and drops the hands on it, ball basically stops dead near him
another good ball, some good bounce there but Mongia gets on top of it and defends comfortably
this one lands on that same spot, but he turns that in front of midwicket for one, well run
full outside off stump, Mongia shoulders arms
full and wide, he chases that and gets beaten, oohs and aahs from the slip cordon
this one moves in from outside off stump, Mongia defends going forward and gets beaten, a sound there but it was bat hitting the boot
angled into him, worked to square leg, no chance of a run
fullish again, driven back to to Bracken
full again and Mongia drives exaggeratedly, gets beaten all ends up
width offered, and still he makes room moving to leg and carves that over the offside for four, cracking shot
a tad fuller, Sehwag gets on top of it and drives to the offside, Martyn moves around from mid-off and fields, they get one
fullish length outside off stump, Mongia eases into a lazy drive to mid-off
and again Sehwag makes room stepping to leg and smashes that over point, Lee gives a valiant chase from third man but thats four
full on the pads, Sehwag cant work the flick away well, they get legbyes anyway
full on off stump, Mongia drives and gets an inside edge to square leg, calls for the run, a mix-up, back goes Sehwag and the throw isnt that good and he gets a life
shortish on middle and leg, worked to square leg for a quick single
good length on the stumps, Mongia defends back to Bracken
width offered, Mongia drives and gets an edge over the slips and down to third man on the bounce
leg stump, tries to flick but ends up with a leg bye to leg gully
short and wide, now thats a better shot from Mongia, stands and cracks the square cut in the gap at point, ball races away
thats a better length outside off, draws a tame drive from Mongia, who's feet go nowhere and he's beaten by the late away movement
good ball on off stump, Sehwag stands and defends, calls for the run, Mongia says no, he turns and Watson in his follow through dives and flips in the throw, misses and Sehwags safe
a bouncer, Sehwag down on his haunches, Bowden signals the one lifter for the over
lands on a shortish length and moves in, Sehwag makes room but can only defend back to Watson
and he makes so much room to leg, comes down and tries to smash over cover, Watson drops one short and Sehwag looks like a fool trying to hook that nowhere
this one's fuller and moving in, Sehwag stands and drives loosely, ball beats him all ends up as it cuts past his bat, he's in a mess is Sehwag
lands on middle and leg, turned off the hips down to backward square leg for one, what an over of nerves
bad ball, short and moving down leg, he tries to pull but cant reach it
good length on middle and off, Sehwag tries to flick that through midwicket but cant time it well
middle and leg line again, worked to midwicket
pitches outside leg and raps him, not out says the umpire
full and he drives, gets an inside edge past square leg, they run hard and Martyn pulls off a good save chasing it
short on middle and off, he turns that well past square leg to the sweeper on the ropes, well struck and they get two
good length outside off stump, easily run down in the gap at gully for one, thats his 50, good for a batsman who had only 54 runs in his last six innings, FYI...
full and its driven to mid-off
short of a length and he opens the face and runs that down to third man
into the pads, he flicks that in front of square leg, ball races away on the quick outfield, his placement is good and he gets four

gone! Lands on a good length and moves away outside off stump, Mongia tries to run that fine, opens the face of the bat and plays away from his body, and all he can do is edge one into Hussey's lap at slip, Australia get another
good length ball moving in from off stump, Dravid's on top of it defending to point with soft hands
fuller this time but Dravid again gets onto it and defends to cover
good length ball, Sehwag slices that to a diving Ponting at backward point
good length outside off stump, defended down into the ground with soft hands
lands outside off stump, Dravid pokes at that and gets an edge that shoots away for four
a straighter ball and he tucks that to the onside for one
hits the seam on a good length outside off stump and kicks up - a puff of dust too - and beats Sehwag
fuller outside off, square driven to Ponting at point
full on off stump, driven to McGrath at mid-on who fumbles and allows the second run
fuller and a tad wide, Dravid tries some sort of late cut and gets beaten
wide outside off stump, and its called wide duly
moves in from outside off stump, Dravid drops the hands and picks up one down to Lee at third man
a bouncer, and he's down on his haunches
short on middle and leg, easily tucked to square leg for one
full outside off stump, Dravid walks into his shot and drives to Johnson at mid-off
lands on a good length and moves in, Sehwag hops and defends
good length ball comes in, Sehwag plays with soft hands in front of point for one
good, fullish ball on the stumps, Dravid defends back to the bowler
a good yorker, but well dug out
full again, Dravid drives down the ground and gets it into the nonstrikers stumps, a mere push but too straight
shortish outside off stump, Dravid drops the hands and keeps it down
a good length on the stumps, worked to mid-on for one
a bouncer sails over him and Bowden calls it wide
full on the stumps, worked to midwicket
full and wide, Sehwag stands there and drives, gets beaten
short and moving down leg, Sehwag stands and works that off the hips to square leg for one
full and its driven to cover
full again, Dravid gets on top and defends towards point
short and moving into him, he stands and defends back to Lee, 144.4kmph on that ball
short and angling into him, Sehwag hops and works that in the air in front of square leg
good length ball on the stumps, Dravid defends awkwardly
short and wide, Dravid finally wakes up and square cuts that in the gap at point-gully, ball scorches the turf
strives for the yorker, but this man's too good, gets on top of that, drives the halfvolley beautifully past mid-wicket for four
good lifting ball outside off stump, left alone
back of length, on the off, Sehwag lets it come to him, drops his wrists, taps it close on the off side
fuller, on the off again, Sehwag goes hard at it, the bottom-hand comes into play a bit too much, ball rolls over to midwicket
Watson goes for his favourite weapon - bouncer.  Whizzes just outside off as Sehwag ducks under
And again. But this time it goes awry. Slips down the leg side.
spearing in on the hips, whipped past square-leg
on the hips again, Dravid whips it fine.
Wah! skillful dab through the vacant slip region. Short-of-length delivery, just outside off, Sehwag let it come to him, opened the face of the bat, ran it down fine. Ala Arjuna Ranatunga.
full and on the middle and leg, Dravid leans forward, his head falls over a bit in the process, tucks it to midwicket.
angled delivery, steered to Ponting at point
this time he uses his wrists more and dabs it to left of Ponting, down to thirdman.
Length-delivery on the middle and it holds the line after landing, Sehwag is bit cramped but pushes it past square-leg.

Johnson goes up in appeal for lbw.  Landed on a length, came back in a touch and Dravid ended up pushing outside the line, and the ball brushed the back pad enroute to Gilchrist who made a diving stop to his right. Ball was going outside the off and too high as well.
on the middle, on a length, pushed back down the track
back of length, around middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket
short of length, on the leg and middle, Dravid pulls, keeps it down the ground but straight to Johnson at long-leg
fuller and just outside the offstump, Sehwag taps it to Ponting at point
banged in short and over the middle and leg, ducked under
Aha! Sehwag couldn't resist the temptation to have a go at Watson. He backs away and throws his bat a length delivery outside off, misses.
Just one run but a lovely shot. Sehwag moved back and across to a fullish delivery on the middle and off and whipped it to right of mid-off where McGrath makes a good tumbling stop
bouncer. Sehwag ducks. dot ball. one for the over.

Johnson strikes for Australia! Huge wicket. Follows the bumper with a lovely indipper. Landed on a length, on the middle and it bent in a bit, Sehwag ended up driving at it outside the line and was trapped plumb in front. A very good innings comes to an end.
slanted across, left alone. Will bring one back in soon
wanted to bring it back in but slips it down the leg side, tickled around the corner. Kaif is off and running.
just short of driveable length, on the off and middle, Dravid leans forward to dead-bat it away
fullish, just outside the off, driven to mid-off
length-delivery on the off and middle, Kaif goes back and across, presents the full face of the bat in defense
on a length again but outside the off stump, dabbed past the wide slip, down to thirdman
wide called as the bouncer slipped down the legside. Dravid goes for the hook., doesn't connect
back of length, just outside the offstump, Dravid presses back, taps it to backward point
hit the deck around short of length, kicked up and jagged in as well, Dravid hops back, pushes it close on the leg side and they rush across for a single
Watson slips down the leg side again. Another bouncer that went awry.
length-delivery on the middle, Kaif goes back, nudges it behind square-leg
almost dragged back on to the stumps. It landed on a length, and held its line outside the offstump, Dravid poked at it, in an effort to run it down to thirdman, and got an inside edge.
pushed across Kaif, bit of room outside off but he lets it go through to Gilchrist
landed on a length around the middle and off, slanted away, steered to point
overpitched outside the off stump, square-driven past point. Easy pickings.
swing and a miss. Remember there is a wide slip and Johnson angles one well outside the off stump and Kaif goes after it.
Kaif pings the thirdman. Slanted delivery outside off and dabbed away
leans forward to push a angled-delivery to ponting at point.
tossed up outside off, driven through extra cover
Oh ho! big turn there! spun from outside the off and speared in on the pads. Kaif was cramped there, shaping for a cut and surprised by the spin
fuller, driven to long-on
floated up on the middle, driven down the ground
beaten as this one didn't turn. Arm-ball outside the off and Kaif wanted to run it down through the slip region but it didn't come in.
beaten. Slanted across, Dravid tries to run it down to thirdman but doesn't connect
slanted delivery on the middle, Dravid whips it across the line, past square-leg
yorker on the off and middle, dug out to cover
Kaif is rapped on the pads as he pressed forward in defense.  It landed just short of driveable length on the off and slanted away.
Another full and angling-away delivery, Kaif wants to drive it through offside, gets an inside edge which takes the ball to wide mid-on
outside off, slanting away, hit uppishly through the vacant gully region, down to thirdman
tossed up, full in length, driven back down the track
biffed over wide midwicket.  Again well-flighted delivery and Dravid went with the spin
floated outside off, full in length, swept behind square. 150 is up
And again but Martyn, behind square-leg, comes in the way.
full and driven to long-on. There is turn from this pavillion end as more dry spots on offer.
punished for driving straight. Too straight and it crashes into the stumps at the other end  and deflects to mid-off. Would have been a boundary.
length delivery , just outside off, Dravid presses back, drops down his wrists, taps it close on the off side. They think about a single but kill the thought when they see Ponting swooping in on it
slightly short in length, on the middle and leg, pulled past square-leg. All along the ground.
outside-edge to thirdman. Kaif drives at a slanted-delivery without fully leaning forward.
Nice tuck shot. On the middle and leg, full in length and Dravid lets it come on to him before rolling his wrists to push it past square-leg
just outside off, pushed to Ponting at point.
on the off and middle, turns in, worked to midwicket
Good cricket allround. Tossed up outside off, Dravid drives it through extra cover and Michael Clarke makes a good diving stop at deep cover
Dravid backs away to cut behind square. Lovely shot.  Not all that short but he used the width of the crease well to rock back and cut against the spin
Now the Azharuddin-like whip shot from the stumps. Goes back to a ball that turns in and whips it from the middle stump line.
on the off stump line, driven to cover
much slower through the air, Kaif waits for the spin to play out, tickles it behind square
angled across, chopped straight to point.
beaten outside the offstump as he went fishing.
fuller and outside off and Kaif tries to drill it through the offside, too much bottom-hand comes into play and the ball rolls to mid-on
Wow! what a shot! creamed through the line and hit on the up. Slanted delivery outside off, Kaif thrust his left leg forward and knifed through the line
on the hips, tucked behind square-leg
spanking pull but just a single as it finds man at the deep square-leg. Banged in short, on the middle stump line, slapped down.
tip and run. soft hands and the ball drops close on the off side and off they go
McGrath announces himself in the second spell. A full-length delivery, just outside offstump, had Kaif pushing at it tentatively and it just goes past a kissing distance from the outer edge
on the stumps, tucked to midwicket
fuller and on the middle and off, pushed down the ground.
Full and on the off stump line, Dravid pushes at it a bit too early and scoops the ball in the air towards mid-off. But the man is back at long-off
overpitched on the middle, driven to long-on
on a length, pushed back down the track.
just outside the off stump, dabbed away to thirdman. Brings Dravid on strike
This time Dravid pings the thirdman region
Kaif brings up the fifty of the partnership with a drive down the ground
short and outside off, cut past point
dot ball as Kaif pushes a fullish delivery to midwicket
length-delivery on the off and middle, Dravid hops back to whip it across the line but can't beat Ponting at midwicket.
length delivery outside the offstump, cut down to wide thirdman

Kaif goes for a pull - he is not flash at it, gets into a terrible position - and sends it high in the air but drops down behind square-leg. Lee, from long-leg, tries to come under it but can't reach it
full and driven to long-on
fullish delivery, outside off, driven to deep cover. He didn't quite come forward, drove away from the body.
Wah! Dravid spanks Lee over midwicket to bring up his 72nd ODI fifty. A predetermined assault. Backed away a touch to pull a short-of-length delivery over midwicket.

Lee gets his revenge. Although quite a tame dismissal. Full-length delivery on the middle and leg and Dravid ended up playing a nothing shot. Just shovelled it straight to Clarke at short midwicket. Big wicket for Australia.
pings in a bumper, ducked under. Welcome to the crease sir!
fuller this time, driven square to Ponting at point
hit the deck around back-of-length, around off stump, came in a touch, pushed close to the off side and they rush across for a single

Almost a repeat of Dravid dismissal. Think the ball is holding up a bit here. Another full-length delivery on the middle and leg, Kaif pushes at it, ball stopped on him a bit, and he scooped it in the air but it goes through vacant mid-on region. Dravid had turned his wrists at the last minute and found midwicket.
overpitched outside off, drilled past cover.
upper-cut over backward point. Down to thirdman. Banged in short and outside off and Dhoni hopped up to carve it over the fielder
just short of driveable length, outside off, swatted away to cover. Too much bottom-hand on that.
Kaif picks up the slower ball early and slapped it over mid-off.
attempted yorker, on the off and middle, pushed down to long-on
Watson gift-wraps a boundary to India. Banged in short but slipping down the leg side and Dhoni helped it to the fine-leg boundary

And the stumps fly everywhere! Inside-edge on to the stumps. Kaif falls. Lee jumps up in glee. It landed on a length, outside the off stump and came back in. Kaif had gone for a huge drive but was beaten by the nip-backer
defends a short-of-length delivery.
fuller and pushed across, Raina leans forward to push it towards cover. Another dot ball. Pressure will build on the youngster.
And again. Yorker, angling outside off, dug out by Raina. Inside-edge takes it to short midwicket
Raina pokes at a angled delivery and is beaten neck and crop. Another dot ball. Here we go.
Would you believe it? An maiden over and this is the 43rd over of the innings. Length-delivery around the offstump line, pushed to cover.
slightly overpitched, outside off, driven to cover. Raina on strike.&
Gets off the strike with a tentative poke across the line. Gets an leading edge which takes the ball straight down the ground, past the bowler, to the mid-off fielder
Fullish, outside off, driven to deep cover
Watson goes for yet another bouncer. And again it sails well over the batsman's head.
Watson is helping Raina's cause here. Another free run and an extra delivery. Slipped down the leg side.
on the leg and middle, Raina could only push it to midwicket.
Raina breaks free with a lovely dab through the vacant slip region.  He opened the bat-face to run an length-delivery down to thirdman. That will allow him to breathe.
pushes a short-of-length delivery behind point
delivered from wide of the crease, into the body of Dhoni who hops back to push it down towards point
And again. Lee pings Dhoni who hops to steer it to Ponting at backward point and completes a quick single
full, around the off stump line, pushed to cover, Clarke swoops in to prevent any run. They want Raina on strike.
Crowd boo as Raina pushes out another dot-ball. straight to mid-on.
And again. Crowd is getting pretty vocal here. length-delivery on the middle and leg cramps up Raina.

Yes sir another dot-ball. Lee has given away just a solitary single in his last 2 overs. Another length-delivery on the middle and leg cramps up Raina who stabs at it. Ball drops down close to his feet. Lee rushes forward to pick it up.
Dhoni drills a fullish delivery down to long-on
Yep. He goes for the slog. Takes his front foot out of the line of a back-of-length delivery and slaps it over midwicket. Watson makes a valiant effort to stop it near the ropes but ...
Low full-toss, Raina throws his bat at it, where does it go? deflects off the bowler's hand and goes towards midwicket. Not timed well but he rushes across to complete a quick single
Dhoni again goes down the ground, to long-off this time. Just a single.
yorker on the middle and off, dug out to long-off. Good bowling Sir!
from round the stumps, attempted yorker turns into low full-toss, Dhoni leans forward to push it down to Andrew Symonds at long-on. He wants a second but symonds fires in flat and accurate throw in.
Dhoni biffs a length-delivery in the air and straight down the ground. Will get two.
McGrath corrects the length. In the blockhole, dug out towards mid--off. Single is taken.
Raina gets Dhoni back on strike with a heave across the line to deep midwicket
bit of room outside offstump, rarity from McGrath, Dhoni goes for one almighty swing, outer edge takes it down to thirdman
full, on the stumps, driven down the ground. Just a single.
Outside offstump, full in length, Dhoni frees his arms, slices it over point. Will get two.
Gone! Caught at long-on. Raina swings a low full-toss at the throat of Watson.
Greets Pathan with a yorker, dug out for a single on the off side. Dhoni on strike
Another one crashes into the bottom of the bat as Dhoni whips a yorker to cover
low full-toss on the off, Pathan leans forward, whips it behind square-leg.
Pathan walks down the wicket, shovels a fullish delivery past midwicket. Will get two runs.
Another full-toss, low and flat, creamed past extra cover. Andrew Symonds slides to make a stop at wide long-off but slides too much. His feet touch the rope and gives away a boundary.
again pings the boot, punched down the ground to long-on.
swing and a miss. Pathan goes for a cut but misses. Dot ball.
Pathan backs away, McGrath goes in for the base of the middle stump, down comes the bat in a hurry, ball rolls over to long-off
that bottom-hand twirl of the bat from Dhoni sends a yorker out to long-off.
banged in short, pulled past square-leg. Just a single though.
Banged in short again, it's not going to a yorker every ball from McGrath, Pathan pulls but straight to Martyn at deep midwicket. Martyn almost fumbles it but holds it in the end.
Yorker on the base of middle stump, bottom-handed twirl comes into play again and sends the ball to long-on. Dhoni wants a second, Harbhajan sends him back. Wise decision.
full and on the middle and leg, whipped across fine. Bottom-hand powered shot.
reaches out to a full-length delivery outside off, slices it to Ponting at cover, who has a shy at non-striker's end and gives away an overthrow
overpitched outside the offstump, drilled powerfully but straight to Ponting at cover
Wah! what a cheeky shot. An reverse sweep! Taps a low full-toss on the off and middle to the thirdman region!
Bowden has given him out!  There was an huge inside-edge. Attempted yorker turns into a low full-toss and Dhoni tries to send it over midwicket, gets an edge onto his pads.

inn2.comm: full and swinging quite a distance outside off stump, Gilchrist swings and gets bat to it, ball runs past the vacant gully region for one down to wide of third man
good ball, pitched on middle and leg and swung in, rapped on the pads as he stood up, but that would have carried on over the stumps, too high
again it lands on middle and leg, this time he gets bat to it and works that to midwicket for one
good, seaming, full delivery outside off stump, Gilchrist wants nothing to do with it
this one lands outside leg stump and carries away, not good for India, Dhoni does the taking behind the stumps, some swing on that ball
well bowled! Pace, swing and seam as it lands outside off stump and Gilchrist hangs his bat out at it and gets suckered into the false shot
lands on middle and off, worked to midwicket
good, fullish ball outside off stump, Watson defends and the ball scoots off the outside edge down to third man
bad, bad ball, very wide outside leg stump and it swings way past Dhoni's despairing dive for runs
good comeback ball, lands outside off stump and seams past Gilchrist's tame drive
lands on a good length, a tad wide, Gilchrist pokes at it and gets an edge that shoots wide of gully, and its a no-ball as well
pitches outside off stump on the scrambled seam, Watson shoulders arms
lands outside off again and seams the other way, away from the right-hander, and Watson watches it through to Dhoni

very close shout for lbw! Full and fired into middle and leg, Watson tries to whip that but cant, rapped on the pads, looked very close, every chap in blue in the stadium goes up in a tumultous roar but Bucknor shakes his head, the hell was wrong with that appeal?
width outside off stump and Gilchrist carves that over point, Munaf tries to field with the boot but messes it up, bad job down there
pitched full on off stump, Gilchrist drives through mid-off, Harbhajan gives chase and doesnt do all that well
angled across him, he was in two minds whether to  play or leave it, ends up shouldering arms at the nth minute
full and wide, Watson drives airily in the gap at gully, ball races to third man
strives for the yorker, well dug out by Gilchrist, shouts of 'NO' back to Watson
well bowled, lands on a good length and moves into him, he defends quickly
drifts down leg, Watson tries to clip that fine but mistimes it, ball runs away and the umpire signals leg byes
a tad fuller and slower on off stump, Watson comes forward and defends, an inside edge gets tangled between his legs
short of a length outside off stump, driven past point for two
short of length again, this time Watson hops and defends
this one comes into him from off stump and he defends

another good shout for leg  before! Pitches around off stump and dips in, Watson's caught falling forward on the defence, Munaf and all else go up in unison but that man Bucknor smiles and shakes his head, too high perhaps?
full in the blockhole, well dug out
pitches on leg and moves away, Gilchrist got on the flick, beaten
not a bad length, but Gilchrist makes room and cracks that imperiously between cover and point for four, well played
lands on a good length and he defends
strives for that yorker again, doesnt get it all that well and Gilchrist manages to defend
again he goes for the yorker, its pitched better than last time, and again Gilchrist is upto the challenge, works that to midwicket
lands on off stump and carries on high, Watson again cant play Munaf well through the on side, falls over in his shot
short of a length outside off stump, Watson drives to cover but takes a hand off the bat as he does so
full on middle and leg stump, Watson gets his head over it and flicks that well through midwicket for four, good shot
better ball on a length, pitches on off stump and Watson goes back and across in defence, presents the full face of the bat, Munaf moves across and fields
short and wide, Watson frees the arms and cracks that over gully and down to a moving Harbhajan at third man on the bounce, didnt land all that from him

cracker! Cuts him in half! Lands outside off stump and moves in considerably, Gilchrist is caught on the hop as the ball seams past him, Dhoni dives to his left and collects, I think the ball may have flicked the trousers on the way through
good ball on the stumps, Watson covers the stumps and defends
poor stuff, full and wide down leg stump, belated wide called
full and wide, Watson squaredrives to backward point
short and wide, Watson gets into position and hammers the pull over square leg, good clean hit
a fuller ball on the stumps, gives it time to swing, Watson uses the feet well and drives back to the bowler
fraction shorter on the stumps, at that pace the ball just sits up and cries out 'HIT ME, HIT ME' and Watson obliges with a thumping smash over square leg for four more
a full toss this time, which Watson willingly puts away past Harbhajan at mid-on, he gives chase and hauls it in as the ball slows up
short and wide, Watson's eyes light up and he cracks the cut smack between cover and point for four more
good length ball on the stumps, Watson runs that down to third man to bring up Australia's 50 in quick time
short and wide, Gilchrist goes for a cut/dab and the ball bounces once in front of the Dhoni and carries on for four
full and wide, Gilchrist frees his arms and drives that past point for four more, India losing the plot thick and fast
good ball comes onto him with some movement off the pitch, Gilchrist caught on the hop, works that to the on side
fullish outside off stump, Watson gets onto the front foot and drives, gets an inside edge back onto the boot, a dot ball!
good length ball outside off stump, driven to Raina at backward point
shortish delivery on the stumps, Gilchrist looks to pull but the ball skids on and raps him on the inner thigh near the groin, ball rolls to Raina at backward point
good length ball nips into him and he works that to square leg for one
good delivery on a good length cuts back and has Gilchirst hopping, ball may have clipped some part of the thigh through to Dhoni, well bowled

great catch! Full and wide, Gilchrist throws the bat at it but can only slam that in the air to Raina at backward point, who holds onto a fine catch, that ball was travelling at some speed but the kid held onto it like a seasoned pro, falls over after he takes it and then runs to his team-mates who engulf him, thats the breakthrough India needed, Gilchrist gone!
good, seaming delivery outside off stump, Ponting shoulders arms
full on the stumps, driven to mid-on
wide down the pads, useless delivery

short of a good length, Watson covers the movement and times the back-foot cut through cover-point very well and sends the ball speeding away, Raina gives chase and pulls it in with a good dive on the ropes

good ball lands on off and moves in, Ponting is caught on the drive, yes, you guessed it, he plays across the pads and falls over as he is wont to do at the start of an innings, a stifled appeal from the Indians
beauty of a ball, lands outside off and sucks him forward, then moves off the seam and he's beaten all ends up
full outside off stump and he gets forward with a big stride, and shoulders arms
comes forward to a fullish ball on the stumps and flicks that down to deep backward square leg for one to get off the mark
another wide down the legs, tsk tsk tsk
an even more shocking delivery that lands a foot outside leg and carries on, Dhoni does well to reach that one
okay, right, better ball outside off stump that Ponting lets through with a stride forward
fullish outside off stump, Ponting gets onto the front foot and drives to cover
full again, Ponting gets onto the front foot and drives through the covers, a polished shot and he has his highest score of the tournament
the kid drops one in short to the wrong bloke, and Ponting swivels and murders that through midwicket for four, Ponting was already waiting on the backfoot
someone help him! This one is way wide of off stump and its called wide
fullish outside off stump, Ponting comes forward and drives to wide of cover for one
fullish outside off stump and a cheeky Watson tries a brave late cut and is beaten
good, fullish delivery outside the off stump, Ponting comes forward and then shoulders arms
drifts to middle and leg, Ponting flicks and gets an inside edge down to fine leg, was looking to go aerial on that shot
short and wide, a little bit of extra bounce, Watson cant time the cut well enough and is beaten chasing it
pitches on off stump and moves in, Watson falls over trying to work that to leg, but Munaf's appeal is turned down, that was going on too high
changes his line to middle and leg, Watson gets forward and whips that past Mongia at midwicket, who gives chase but ends up diving with the ball over the ropes
full outside off stump and its left alone with a raise of the arms
full outside off stump, Ponting gets a stride in and shoulders arms
good length ball on the stumps, comes in and its defended in a hurry
gets some lift from outside off stump, and it beats Ponting's attempt to flay it past cover
fullish and wide, Ponting comes forward and angles that wide of Dravid at second slip for four to third man, intelligent shot
full and wide, he shoulders arms again
dragged in short outside off stump, Ponting gets into position and hammers the pull past Mongia at midwicket, no chance to haul that ball in, four more to the Aussie captain
good ball on the stumps, batsman goes back and defends
short of a good length, Watson drives to Munaf at mid-off, there's a mixup between Gilchrist the runner and Ponting, but a late reaction from the fielder
full in the slot outside off stump, Watson gets to it and frees the arms, picks up four past mid-off, no need for bad calling when you time them like that
short and wide, cut down to third man
too short, begging to be hit, and Watson does so with a smashing cut in the gap at cover, four runs all the way
full outside off stump, he shoulders arms, Australia have 101 on the board, great start for them
tossed up, Ponting comes forward and defends
flatter line, Ponting comes back and defends off the backfoot
tossed up, comes forward and drives that to long-on for one
short and wide, Watson late cuts that for four, nicely done
tossed up on off stump, works that past batpad for one
tossed up, Ponting forward and works that past batpad for one to midwicket, excellent running
flat delivery, goes back and drives to mid-off, easy run
dropped short, Watson rocks back and pulls that in the air over midwicket, calls of 'CATCH IT' but the ball lands in no-mans-land, and Watson has 50
tossed up, he looks to work that square but the ball pops up
Mongia strikes! Tossed up outside off stump, Watson goes back and tries to defend, misses and is struck marginally outside the line, but Bucknor upholds the appeal, didnt look out to me
tossed up outside off stump, Martyn tries a tip-and-run and very nearly plays onto his stumps, he's lucky to survive
tossed up, Ponting uses his feet well and drives to mid-on
tossed up outside off stump, ball turns in and catches Martyn on the drive
tossed up again, Martyn looking for spin and plays it well
tossed up, Martyn sweeps that around the corner, ball is in the air for a long time but no one's there
tossed up a tad wider, the straighter ball, and Martyn misses the sweep, words from Harbhajan
a shorter line and its spin past him for byes as Dhoni cant take it cleanly
tossed up, he uses the feet well and drives to mid-on
tossed up, defends back to him
short and he crunches that to Raina who stops well at backward point
flighted up, he tries to sweep and misses, the ball carries on straight, a convincing shout from everyone in the stadium but the umpire shakes his head, looked close to me
tossed up again, this time he manages the sweep to midwicket for one
flatter ball, Ponting defends
tossed up, some sharp spin as Ponting comes forward, ball pops up over batpad
tossed up, worked around the corner
tossed up, Ponting tries to work that around the corner but finds the fielder
tossed up on off stump, Ponting whips that through midwicket with the spin for a couple
tossed up on off stump, he uses the feet and drives to mid-on
tossed up, tries to defend but gets an outside edge that pops up on the offside, but no one's there
short and wide, bad ball, cracked to point where Raina dives over it and its four more
tossed up, a great length, Ponting goes back and defends, gets the edge which pops up towards gully, where are the fielders?
flatter outside off stump, Ponting gets to the pitch and drives to mid-off
this one lands outside off stump and comes in with the arm, Martyn manages to cut that
tossed up on middle and off and Martyn comes forward in defence
tossed up, Martyn is caught half-cock trying to defend, ball spins in and strikes the pad, they all go up in appeal but once more Bucknor says an NO, maybe that one was carrying on too much
tossed up, Ponting drives to cover but Martyn is not interested
tossed up again, this time he defends
not as flighted, Ponting comes down and whips that to midwicket
tossed up, Martyn comes forward and works that in the gap at midwicket for two
changes his line a bit, Martyn defends watchfully
straighter ball on off stump, Martyn gets the pad forward and pokes the bat out, ala Kevin Pietersen
a tad shorter outside off stump, Ponting goes back and pushes that in front of point
flatter on middle and leg, Martyn whips that near square leg for one
shorter on middle and leg, Ponting goes back and works that to deep backward square leg
tossed up, Martyn uses the feet superbly and drives past a diving Pathan at mid-on, ball beats the chase and skims over the ropes
tossed up, Martyn gets a foot forward and dabs that in front of midwicket for a sharp single
flatter and shorter, Ponting goes back and defends with a straight bat
tossed up outside off and spins in, Martyn gets a full stretch and tries to sweep, gets beaten and they appeal, but notout says Bowden, pitched outside
tossed up, Martyn comes down and whips that to mid-on for one
flatter and Ponting's down the track, drives to deep midwicket
tossed up, again he drives in the vacant midwicket gap, India need to plug that
straighter, he goes back and works to the onside
tossed up, Ponting comes forward and smothers the spin, well played
tossed up, he goes back and defends
tossed up, comes down and drives to mid-on
flatter ball, he goes back and defends
bad ball, wide down the pads
short and wide, Martyn runs that to Raina at gully
good ball, tossed up and Martyn defends
full on the legs and its eased into the square leg region for one
tossed up, comes forward and defends
tossed up outside off, Martyn doesnt time the sweep well at all
tossed up outside off stump again, Martyn comes forward and then leaves it, ball spins past and Dhoni whips off the bails, but he had his foot back in
tossed up, played with soft hands for one down to third man
short and wide, Ponting makes room and crashes that past point for four, rubbish ball, good shot
tossed up, defended
lands on the off, turns away slightly, defended off the front foot
arm-ball comes in from off stump line, Martyn jabs at it, gets an inside-edge on to pads
drifting in on the middle and leg, hit on the pads as he attempts to work it to on side
floated on the middle, pushed to midwicket
on the off, steered to point and they steal a single. Very good batting. No major risk, just nudges and pushes.
tossed up a bit, on the middle, pushed to mid-on. Yet another single.
turns from just outside off, Ponting adjusts to work it fine on the leg side
comes down the track, Harbhajan holds back the length, Ponting lunges forward to nudge it behind square-leg
spins in from outside off, sharp turn, Martyn presses forward in defense, is hit on the pads
flat and fast. Straight on the off, pushed away.
tossed up outside off, full in length, Martyn lets it go through to Dhoni
backs away to cut but Kaif at cover makes a good diving stop
floated on the offstump, pushed down the ground
drifts in straight on the middle, worked to midwicket
And again, drifting in, pushed to cover
Sehwag starts off with one on the off, pushed away to the offside
turns in slightly from outside off, defended off the front foot
full and on the off, Ponting leans forward to work with the spin past midwicket
tossed up, bit too full, driven down the ground to long-on
floats it outside off, Ponting comes down the track to drive it to cover
leans forward, pushes a ball on the off to midwicket, wants a run but is sent back
slightly short, comes in with the angle, Martyn backs away to cut but straight to point
on the middle, worked to right of Dravid at midwicket
leans forward to push a fullish delivery to cover
fifty of the partnership up. wide down the leg side. Very patient and clever batting.
short and Ponting backs away to cut past point
straight on the middle, defended away
comes down the track, drives to long-on
slightly flatter, turns in from outside off, worked to midwicket
spins in from outside off, Martyn backs away to cut but is cramped up a bit, ends up pushing it to cover
India continue to leak singles and twos. On the middle, worked with the spin past square-leg
beaten! drifted outside off before gripping the surface to bite back in sharply. Martyn shaped up for a cut and was surprised by the bite. Troubled not by the spin but by the fizz off the track.
full, straight on the off, driven back to the bowler
just short of driveable length, on the off, Ponting leans forward to push it past cover
Martyn gives the charge, drills a cover drive but straight to Kaif at cover
Now backs away to cut. Martyn doesn't want the youngster to settle down. Chops it to thirdman where Harbhajan makes the stop and hurled in a smart throw, right over the bails
Ponting tries to follow Martyn. Short of length and moved away after landing outside offstump, and Ponting goes for  a cut but is beaten by the extra bounce
No problem this time though. Ponting reaches his fifty with a on-drive past midwicket. Overpitched on the middle and leg and put away in style. Well played Sir!&
on the middle, turns down legside, tickled fine
full and driven to mid-off
Whoa! that one spun big. But quite a rubbish length. Very short and it was going down the legside, Martyn just helped it along to the fine-leg fence
comes down the track, drives to left of Harbhajan Singh at long-on
turns in from outside off, nudged to the on side
pings the zone outside off, Ponting goes for a cut but is beaten as the ball kept a touch low
And again. This time by the extra bounce. Ponting threw his bat at a wide one, doesn't connect
Doesn't miss out on a boundary this time. Banged in short, Ponting swivels off his front foot to pull it away behind square-leg. The best puller in world.
Sreesanth comes back with a beauty. Drew Ponting forward with a length-delivery before taking it out to beat the intended defensive shot

Sreesanth gets his man. But maybe too late now. Again Ponting lunges forward at a length-delivery outside the offstump, ends up pushing too hard at it as it leaves him and nicks it low to Tendulkar at first slip. SRT dived to his left to pull off a stunning catch
in thechannel again, left alone.
floats in on the middle, Martyn comes down the track, works it with the spin to midwicket
Almost caught at short-leg. Kaif jumps up too early - he is quite bad at that position - and as the ball dips near his boots he tries to grab it but ....
And Martyn breaks free with a lofted drive over the bowler's head. He came down the track to cream it  straight over
again flatter, paddled away fine
on the middle, Martyn goes back to push it away.
Symonds presents the full-face of the bat in defense. Head over the ball and all that jazz.
Ah! had enough of dead-batting around, tries to carve one past point.. one small problem... didn't connect
Symonds pushes a length-delivery to the leg side, Sreesanth rushes across to make a diving stop. Good commitment. The kid is fighting hard.

Reckless shot from Martyn. He jumped down the track and backed outside leg in the process, and went for a cut, missed and the ball just shaved past the off stump. Hmm..  Symonds is across to have a chat
overpitched, driven through the on-side ring
And again Sreesanth hurls himself to make a diving stop. Symonds had pushed one in the direction of midwicket, Sreesanth ran across to make the stop.
full and on the off, paddled away fine. Munaf Patel runs across to make the stop but they run hard to take two.
And again. Paddled to Munaf at fine-leg
200 up for Australia as Martyn comes down the track to drive it to long-on. Only 50 more runs required
bit more air this time, Symonds leans forward to smother the spin
fuller and drilled to Tendulkar at mid-off
Spanking sweep shot. On the stumps and down went Symonds on his knee, down came the bat to slap it past square-leg.
just short of driveable length, outside off, Martyn leans forward to push it to cover
short of length, outside off, Martyn chops itdown to the ground and  to right of Tendulkar at first slip.
slightly short of length, around the offstump line, shapes away, Martyn adjusts to push it to the off side.
Jaffa! Landed on the seam, on a length, around the off stump line,shaped away ever so slightly away and Martyn ends up pushing inside the line
Wild swing and a miss. Martyn jumps out to slog, doesn't connect.
on the offstump line, again flat trajectory, pushed back down the track
Swept in front of square. Another flat and fast delivery, slapped to the on side
flighted a bit, driven down the ground

dropped by Dravid! It was a doosra and Martyn pushed at it, inside the line, got an outside edge and it almost brushes Dhoni's gloves and goes to  left of Dravid who stretches his left hand to palm it away
slips down the legside. Don't know why the wide wasn't called. Martyn seems bemused.
length-delivery outside offstump, comes in a touch, Martyn pushes at it, gets an outside edge, down to thirdman
full and straight on the off and middle, pushed to cover
drifting on to the pads, don't bowl there son, flicked in the air past midwicket
Sreesanth moved wide of the crease at the last minute, ala Mudassar Nasar, speared in one on the middle and leg, stabbed away to the leg side
There is something about Sreesanth which gets Martyn to attempt something wild. Again he wants to slog the youngster, gets a top-edge to thirdman
tossed up, no spin goes straight on, Martyn is down the track in a flash and pings the cover boundary with a lovely inside-out drive
C'mon Symonds,.... give us a six!   Nope, he leans forward to push a length-delivery down the ground
almost a mix-up, Martyn pushes it to point, wants a run but is sent back in time
Martyn brings up his 37th ODI fifty with a drive down the ground.
starts off with a length-delivery on the offstump line, eased to covers
Take that! Out comes Martyn's left foot, down comes the bat to flay a fullish ball over mid-off. Super shot.
bit too early into his drive, checks the stroke to push it to mid-on
Munaf appeals in anguish. Landed on a length< outside offstump< came back in to rap martyn on the pads  outside the line
Martyn wants to finish this off quickly. Backs away, doesn't find the room to drive, tries to cut but misses.
backs away to cut a short-of-length delivery to deep cover
full and on the middle, tucked past square-leg
Nope, he is tucked up by the one that comes back in after landing on a length around the middle. He jabs at it.
Pathan gets a cheap wicket. Symonds backed away to slog, missed and was cleaned up.
Martyn peppers the cover fence again. Elegant inside-out drive past extra cover. No fuss.
Only ten runs left now. Martyn backs away to drill a blistering square-drive past point.
Again he backs away, Munaf keeps it on the stumps, chopped down to thirdman
well outside the offstump, Clarke covers the stumps, shoulders arms
in the zone outside the offstump, left alone. Give it a whack little pup!
Martyn moves outside legstump, Pathan pushes it outside off, Martyn doesn't chase it.
on the hips.. tucked away behind square-leg
Clarke is beaten outside offstump. He pushes outside the line of a slanted delivery. Acts as if he intended to leave it but Mate! you can't fool the camera!
no confusion this time, lets it go through to Dhoni
gets Martyn on strike with a push-drive to midwicket
Down the legside, faint tickle could have fetched Martyn a four but ...
Martyn was looking for a single to retain the strike but couldn't get Pathan away. Choked him with a length-delivery on the off and middle.
Clarke leans forward, head over the ball, left elbow high and pushes a length-delivery to cover!
Gets an outside edge to thirdman this time. Again the intent was to defend - he is trying to tease us a bit I think .
Munaf doesn't tease Martyn. Bangs in a bouncer down the leg side.
Well-directed bouncer this time, swatted away past square-leg.

That's it... Martyn gets the winning runs. Flicks a low full-toss past midwicket. Martyn gets all pumped up, hops and skips in joy. The pumped-up fist is also on display and why not. Australia have knocked out India and are through to the semi-finals.
